addImage(String) - Method in class pcd.data.ImageDataObjectFactory
Deprecated.
Appends new ImageDataObject to ImageDataStorage.

This is not how a factory class is supposed to function and it will be removed in the future. Use ImageDataObjectFactory.makeImage(java.lang.String) instead.
